external_references.source_name: CSIRT CTI MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD TONESHELL JAN 2024
external_references.description: CSIRT CTI. (2024, January 23). Stately Taurus Targets Myanmar Amidst Concerns over Military Junta’s Handling of Rebel Attacks. Retrieved August 4, 2025.
Golo Muhr, Joshua Chung. (2025, May 15). Hive0154 targeting US, Philippines, Pakistan and Taiwan in suspected espionage campaign. Retrieved August 4, 2025.
Nick Dai, Vickie Su, Sunny Lu. (2022, November 18). Earth Preta Spear-Phishing Governments Worldwide. Retrieved August 4, 2025.

objects.description: [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has utilized HTTP for a C2 protocol through HTTP POST.(Citation: CSIRT CTI MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD TONESHELL JAN 2024)(Citation: 2022 November_TrendMicro_Earth Preta_Toneshell_Pubload) [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) has also utilized HTTPS for C2.(Citation: 2025_IBM_PUBLOAD_TONESHELL_HIUPAN_CLAIMLOADER_MUSTANG PANDA)
